verses.roman:
āpana-nikaṭe prabhu sabā vasāilā
āpani śrī-haste sabāre mālya-gandha dilā

synonyms: āpana-nikaṭe—by His own side; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sabā—all of them; vasāilā—made sit; āpani—personally Himself; śrī-haste—with His hand; sabāre—unto everyone; mālya—garland; gandha—sandalwood pulp; dilā—offered.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu made all the devotees sit at His side, and with His own hand He offered them garlands and sandalwood pulp.
